snippet.title: Seihou Shuusou Gyoku Lunatic 1cc
snippet.description:
A 1cc of SG on it's highest difficulty setting. 

Seihou is kind of the sister series to Touhou. Although Seihou likes to replace Touhou's huge amount of slow bullets with faster and fewer bullets and give you an actual reasonable amount of resources. As a result, Seihou is quite a bit harder than Touhou. 

The first two stages are pretty easy. Mai and Mei are trick bosses though, but once you know what to do they become trivial. The final pattern of the first boss gets really fun if you time it out actually. think of Eternal Meek except twice as hard.
Gates has an attack that makes people's eyes bleed I've heard. Fortunately for those the attack is static. 
Marie is the place where I start spamming bombs like no tomorrow. She is easily one of the hardest things in this game, especially at max rank. She took a lot less resources in this run than she normally does. 
Because of that I was lucky to have a bomb for the stage 5 midboss. You don't really see it but this thing is utterly ridiculous on max rank.
VIVIT is absolute rape. I got really unlucky with the random attack patterns she used. I can dodge the laser spam but only if she does it at the start of the fight. 
Stupid death and a deathbomb ruin an awesome run. :(

I accidentally the rank I think though. Even after dieing a few times the rank was still motherfucking high.  :V

If you're wondering why the sound is sometimes weird, it's because I had to click outside the window (yes I had to play this in a window ;_;) because the boss music sometimes just randomly doesn't play.
